item.title: Introducing new and upcoming Entra Recommendations to enhance security and productivity
item.description: Managing the myriad settings and resources within your tenant can be daunting. In an era of escalating security risks and an unprecedented global threat landscape, organizations seek trusted guidance to enhance their security posture That’s why we introduced Microsoft Entra Recommendations to diligently monitor your tenant’s status, ensuring it remains secure and healthy. Moreover, they empower you to extract maximum value from the features offered by Microsoft Entra ID.
